com.razer.sdk

Class LoginManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.razer.sdk.LoginManager

  • public final class LoginManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Singleton class for initiating the auth flow.

    • Method Detail

      • getInstance

        public static LoginManager getInstance()
        Returns:
        Returns the singleton instance ot the Login manager

      • login

        public boolean login(android.app.Activity activity,
                     java.lang.String clientId,
                     java.lang.String[] scopes,
                     java.lang.String redirectUrl,
                     java.lang.String clientSecret)
        Parameters:
        activity - Required. Context
        clientId - Required. Please visit Razer's Developer website to get your clientID
        scopes - Required. Please refer to Razer's Developer website for the available Scopes[@see SCOPE_PROFILE, @see SCOPE_EMAIL, @see SCOPE_PHONE, @see SCOPE_ADDRESS]
        redirectUrl - Required. Please refer to the redirect URL you have specified in Razer's developer website.
        clientSecret - Optional. Please refer to Razer's Developer website to get your client Secret
        Returns:
        returns true if successful.

      • isLoggedIn

        public boolean isLoggedIn()
        Returns:
        returns true if the user has authenticated and given the app permission

        Returns:

        public boolean unRegisterCallback(CallbackManager callbackManager,
                                  Callback callback)
        Parameters:

        callback - Listener callback @see Callback
        Returns:
        returns true for first time registration

      • login

        public boolean login(Token token)
              throws TokenExpiredException
        Logs the User in with an existing token
        Parameters:
        token - Serialized token
        Returns:
        returns true if successful
        Throws:
        TokenExpiredException - thrown if the token expiry time has passed

      • logout

        public boolean logout()
        Clears existing token and Webview session; This method does not affect the Auth state of other Razer apps.
        Returns:
        true if successful
